column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I have never waited this long for pizza.. When we arrived and were told it would take 1.5 wait but we could pre-order our pizza so it would be ready by the time the table was ready
column2: so we went ahead and "pre-order"... our table ended up being ready within 45 minutes so we were excited! unfortunately our waitress was not the friendliest or attentive
column3: took 15 min to get drinks then when she took our order we indicated we had a "pre-order" for the pizza so she said ok. Thankfully we order some wings which came out within 15-20 min
column4: no pizza... so we patiently waited another 20-30 minutes and noticed other tables seated after us got their pizza
